summary: Fixed 404 bug on product pages caused by legacy region alias lookups by creating findOfferingBySlug() function. Applied vintage recipe card aesthetic across all pages with inset images, typewriter-style labels, and warm paper color palette.
key_tasks: Created findOfferingBySlug() for region alias handling
Redesigned homepage with vintage notecard aesthetic
Redesigned product detail pages with recipe card layout
Built and pushed to GitHub for Vercel deployment
